definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: kingdom, dominion, reign (on form cf. We:1Sa 15:28 Dr:ad loc. id.);—cstr. [[מַמְלְכוּת]] Jos 13:12 + 8t.;
kingdom of Og Jos 13:12, Jos 13:30, Jos 13:31; of Sihon v:Jos 13:21, v:Jos 13:27.
dominion, royal power c. [[קָרַע מֵעַל]] (subj. ´[[י]]) 1Sa 15:28; c. [[הֵשִׁיב לְ]] (hum. subj.) 2Sa 16:3; c. [[הִשְׁבִּית]] Ho 1:4.
